tei:classSpec.tei:gloss: articulation attribute class for physical time
tei:classSpec.tei:desc: This class provides physical time based attributes used for articulation definitions.

tei:attDef.tei:desc: Set the absolute duration of the note (in milliseconds).
Change the absolute duration of the note by the specified value (in milliseceonds).
Delay the note by the specified value (in milliseconds).

tei:remarks.tei:p: The delay shifts the whole note along the time axis, i.e. its onset and offset. If only the onset should be shifted, use attribute absoluteDurationChangeMs to compensate the delay for the offset. In this case, the editor should take care that the note's duration is greater than the delay/compensation, i.e. no negative durations are created thereby.
